title: The Complete Guide to Obtaining CAA Permission for Drone Flying in Sri Lanka
author: Vanowarna Aerials
summary: A comprehensive guide to navigating the drone regulations set by the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka (CAASL). Learn about drone classification, registration, operational categories, and the full application process to ensure legal compliance for recreational and commercial flights.

title: DJI Air 3 Drone: A Comprehensive Review
author: Vanowarna Aerials
summary: This comprehensive review covers the DJI Air 3, a mid-range drone featuring a dual-camera system with identical sensors, a 46-minute maximum flight time, and advanced omnidirectional obstacle sensing. It's positioned as a powerful tool for content creators seeking professional features without a flagship price.
